Use natural materials such as leaves, branches, and vines to create a makeshift shelter or tent.
Dress in layers of clothing made from various materials like wool, cotton, and silk to keep warm and dry.
Create a portable raincoat using a tarpaulin or plastic sheeting and tie it around your body.
Build a fire using dry wood and use it to keep warm and cook food.
Use your imagination to come up with creative ways to protect yourself from the elements, such as using cardboard boxes as hats or creating a fort out of sandbags.
